title: Angular Schematic Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic schematic in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the schematic file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the schematic in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the schematic?

type.x-prompt: Which schematic type would you like to generate?

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new schematic.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.
